description: Theirs is an existence too large to comprehend. The mother of all darkness. The true lors of the Monster race. One who longs to regain their original form. A darkness beyond blackest pitch. Deeper than the deepest night. One who shines like gold upon Sea of Chaos. A void witchin everything. The source of all chaos. One who has dominion over all terrible dreams. In short, the Lord of Nightmares.
name: Lord of Nightmares
